item.title: Contributing
item.description: How to file a bug report If you have any suggestions for improvements please do not hesitate to open an issue. How to contribute code We encourage you to contribute new plugins. We use gerrithub for reviewing proposed changes. The submission process looking something like this: Clone the Risu repository: git clone https://github.com/Risuorg/Risu.git Configure the git-review tool: git-review -s Check out a branch in which to make your changes: git checkout -b "your-new-branch" Edit your files and validate with tox:
